item.title: Pelican, Python, and Bash for Windows
item.description:
This site is up and running after setting up Bash for Ubuntu for Windows and Pelican. There are a few issues on BfW right now, but seeing Ubuntu's command-line capabilities on Windows 10 is eye-opening for long-time Windows users.
